scripts.start-example-react: yarn build-web && yarn build-react && yarn build-devtools && cp -R ./packages/hcl-sdk-web-devtools/dist/devtools ./examples/web/react/public/hcl-sdk-tools && cd packages/hcl-sdk-web-ui-react && yarn link && cd ../../examples/web/react && yarn && yarn link '@healthcarelocator/sdk-react' && yarn start
scripts.build-example-react: yarn build-web && yarn build-react && yarn build-devtools && cd packages/hcl-sdk-web-ui-react && yarn link && cd ../../examples/web/react && yarn && yarn link '@healthcarelocator/sdk-react' && yarn build
scripts.start-example-angular: yarn build-web && yarn build-devtools && cp -R ./packages/hcl-sdk-web-devtools/dist/devtools ./examples/web/angular/src/assets/hcl-sdk-tools && cd packages/hcl-sdk-web-ui-angular && yarn run build && cd dist/hcl-sdk && yarn link && cd ../../../../examples/web/angular && yarn && yarn link '@healthcarelocator/sdk-angular' && yarn start
scripts.build-example-angular: yarn build-web && yarn build-devtools && cd packages/hcl-sdk-web-ui-angular && yarn run build && cd dist/hcl-sdk && yarn link && cd ../../../../examples/web/angular && yarn && yarn link '@healthcarelocator/sdk-angular' && yarn build
scripts.build-example-web: yarn clean-example-web && yarn build-web && yarn build-devtools && rm -rf ./examples/web/cdn/hcl-sdk-web-ui && cp -R ./packages/hcl-sdk-web-ui/dist/hcl-sdk ./examples/web/cdn/hcl-sdk-web-ui && rm -rf ./examples/web/cdn/hcl-sdk-tools && cp -R ./packages/hcl-sdk-web-devtools/dist/devtools ./examples/web/cdn/hcl-sdk-tools
